info.title: K2 Workflow
info.description: Use the K2 Workflow API service to remotely work with workflows and tasks.

get.description: Use operations to manage the workflow API.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform.

200.description: Returns a message verify the success of the operation

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a server event by serial number.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the server event. Ex: 1234_5678.

200.description: Returns a server event json definition string.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

post.description: Send a finish response to an async server task awaiting a response

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the server event. Ex: 1234_5678

parameters.name: userDefinedFields
parameters.description: Additional fields to update.

204.description: Send a finish response to an async server task awaiting a response

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

default.description: Send a finish response to an async server task awaiting a response

get.description: Obtain a list of tasks available to the connected user.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Returns list of tasks for the connected user.

200.description: Returns a list of tasks using the optional username parameter as the context if specified.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a task by serial number.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

200.description: Returns a task using the optional username parameter as the context if specified.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a list of actions for the task.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

200.description: Gets a list of Actions for the serial number specified.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

post.description: Sends a task to another person.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

parameters.name: redirectData
parameters.description: The username of the target person.

204.description: Redirects a task to the specified user and optionally updates workflow data and xml fields. No response is returned.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

default.description: Redirects a task to the specified user and optionally updates workflow data and xml fields. No response is returned.

post.description: Sleeps a task for a duration, either number of seconds or until a date.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

parameters.name: sleepData
parameters.description: The sleep duration for the task, either as the number of seconds or until a specific date.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Number of seconds or yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss:fffZ(UTC format).

204.description: Sleeps a task for either the specified duration or until the specified date. No response is returned.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

default.description: Sleeps a task for either the specified duration or until the specified date. No response is returned.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

204.description: Releases a task. No response is returned.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: The specified Task was not found.

default.description: Releases a task. No response is returned.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

204.description: Wakes up a task. No response is returned.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: The specified Task was not found.

default.description: Wakes up a task. No response is returned.

post.description: Assigns a task to the current user.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

204.description: Assigns a task. No response is returned.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

default.description: Assigns a task. No response is returned.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

parameters.name: customAction
parameters.description: The task action, defined by the workflow.

parameters.name: userDefinedFields
parameters.description: Additional fields to update along with the task action.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Data fields, XML Fields, and Item References.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

get.description: Get a list of available workflows.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of workflow. Startable or Owned.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a workflow definition by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

post.description: Creates and starts a new workflow instance.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify a workflow ID to start instance.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Send workflow instance object to start workflow.

200.description: Creates and starts a new workflow instance.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a workflow JSON schema by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

200.description: Returns the JSON schema for a particular workflow.

400.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

404.description: Returns information about the error that occurred.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the server event. Ex: 1234_5678

workflowID.description: The ID of the workflow associated with the server event.

workflowName.description: The name of the workflow associated with the server event.

workflowDisplayName.description: The display name of the workflow associated with the server event.

workflowCategory.description: The category of the workflow associated with the server event.

workflowInstanceID.description: The instance ID of the workflow associated with the server event.

workflowInstanceFolio.description: The folio of the workflow instance associated with the server event.

activityInstanceID.description: The activity instance ID of the server event.

activityInstanceDestinationID.description: The activity instance destination ID of the server event.

activityName.description: The activity name of the server event.

eventName.description: The event name of the server event.

eventDescription.description: The event description of the server event.

dataFields.description: The data fields of the activity.

xmlFields.description: The XML fields of the activity.

itemReferences.description: The item references of the workflow instance.

workflowInstanceDataFieldsString.description: String representaation of the data fields of the Workflow Instance.
workflowInstanceDataFieldsString.x-ms-summary: Server Event Workflow Data Fields String

itemReferencesString.description: String representing the item references of the workflow instance.

StartDate.description: Date and time the event instance started.

ExpectedDuration.description: Expected duration of the event instance.

name.description: The name of an XML field.

value.description: The value of the XML field.

XmlFields.description: The XML fields of the workflow instance.

ItemReferences.description: The Item Reference fields of the workflow instance.

DataFields.description: The data fields of the workflow instance.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

status.description: The status of the task. Ex: Open, Completed, Sleep, Allocated, Available

taskStartDate.description: The start date of the task.

sleepUntil.description: The date and time when the task will wake.

formURL.description: The form URL of the task.

viewFlowURL.description: The View Flow URL of the task.

workflowID.description: The ID of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowName.description: The name of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowDisplayName.description: The display name of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowCategory.description: The category of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowInstanceID.description: The instance ID of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowInstanceFolio.description: The folio of the workflow instance associated with the task.

activityInstanceID.description: The activity instance ID of the task.

activityInstanceDestinationID.description: The activity instance destination ID of the task.

activityName.description: The activity name of the task.

eventName.description: The event name of the task.

eventDescription.description: The event description of the task.

instruction.description: The instructions associated with the task.

fqn.description: Fully qualified name of the person. Ex: bob@denallix.com, K2:Denallix\Bob

nonBatchableActions.description: List of actions that cannot be taken without assigning the task.

batchableActions.description: List of actions that can be taken without assigning the task.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the task. Ex: 1234_5678

status.description: The status of the task. Ex: Open, Completed, Sleep, Allocated, Available

taskStartDate.description: The start date of the task.

sleepUntil.description: The date and time when the task will wake.

formURL.description: The form URL of the task.

viewFlowURL.description: The View Flow URL of the task.

workflowID.description: The ID of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowName.description: The name of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowDisplayName.description: The display name of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowCategory.description: The category of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowInstanceID.description: The instance ID of the workflow associated with the task.

workflowInstanceFolio.description: The folio of the workflow instance associated with the task.

activityInstanceID.description: The activity instance ID of the task.

activityInstanceDestinationID.description: The activity instance destination ID of the task.

activityName.description: The activity name of the task.

eventName.description: The event name of the task.

eventDescription.description: The event description of the task.

workflowInstanceDataFields.description: The data fields of the workflow instance.

activityDataFields.description: The data fields of the activity.

workflowInstanceXmlFields.description: The XML fields of the workflow instance.

itemReferences.description: The item references of the workflow instance.

workflowInstanceDataFieldsString.description: String representaation of the data fields of the Workflow Instance.

itemReferencesString.description: String representing the item references of the workflow instance.

RedirectTo.description: The person to whom the task is redirected.

SleepFor.description: The number of seconds to sleep a task.

SleepUntil.description: The date and time to wake the task. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss:fffZ UTC

systemName.description: The system name of the workflow.

expectedDuration.description: The expected duration of the workflow.

folio.description: The folio of the workflow instance.

expectedDuration.description: The expected duration of the workflow instance.

priority.description: The priority of the workflow instance.

dataFields.description: The data fields of the workflow instance.

xmlFields.description: The XML fields of the workflow instance.

itemReferences.description: The item references of the workflow instance.

workflow.description: The schema of the workflow instance.

ExpectedDuration.description: Expected duration of the event instance.

StartDate.description: Date and time the event instance started.
